On a separate note, I kinda wish in some ways I could figure out what I want to do for an alternate telling to the events of Naruto Shippuden after that first clash between Naruto and Sasuke... I got some ideas since my friend and I have worked on an RP about it, but... I dunno, what do you think, guys who have read it?

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5453dae3636872476b780000#post_5453dae3636872476b780000
True, Squiggy, since this AU is gonna be set up from the event of Naruto STOPPING Sasuke from getting to Orochimaru. I really have thought of Sasuke's character overall in this story, which Kurt (my friend) and I dubbed "Naruto: The Demon Within" being a little akin to Riku in Kingdom Hearts; since as you see him fall into darkness, he begins to show serious regrets, and tries his hardest later on to make amends.
